testcase.classname: CybertekTraining App Database and UI data verification
testcase.name: Student data UI and Database verification
testcase.system-out: Given User is on CybertekTraining page......................................passed When User clicks on Students button.........................................passed And User clicks on Add Student button.......................................passed And User enters all the student information into required boxes.............passed And User enters all the company information into required boxes.............passed And User clicks on Submit button............................................passed And User query database with sql "select first_name, last_name from student where first_name = 'David'";.passed Then UI data and Database data must contain "David".........................passed

testcase.classname: CybertekTraining App Database and UI data verification
testcase.name: Teacher data UI and Database verification
testcase.system-out: Given User is on CybertekTraining page......................................passed When User clicks on Teachers button.........................................passed And User clicks on Add Teacher button.......................................passed And User enters all the teacher information into required boxes.............passed And User clicks on Submit button............................................passed And User query teacher database with sql "select first_name, last_name from teacher where first_name = 'Joe'";.passed Then UI data and Database data must contain "Joe"...........................passed
